name: Clean Code Principles
description: Write maintainable, readable, and efficient code
principles: MINIMIZE REDUNDANCY - No duplicate code, extract common patterns
SINGLE RESPONSIBILITY - Each function/class does one thing well
CLEAR NAMING - Names should reveal intent without comments
SMALL FUNCTIONS - Functions should be short and focused
DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) - Eliminate duplication aggressively
PROPER ERROR HANDLING - Handle errors explicitly and gracefully
COMPREHENSIVE DOCUMENTATION - Docstrings for all public APIs
TYPE SAFETY - Use types to prevent runtime errors
MINIMAL DEPENDENCIES - Only import what's needed

guidelines.functions: One level of abstraction per function
